You can be schizofrenic thru your dad, you better start to trust someone or things will be worse...from the people around you, you can choose one to trust and start to explain the situation.please dont do anything bad to you, it is just agains our nature hurting ourselfs or anyone else.once again you have to trust someone
So much time

make sure she kepts it real, i mean no conspyracies theory online, that she works, if she derails from anything real the delusions will get the better of them...dont let your family stop talking to her because she might be mad and they dont want do deal with, they have to deal with this or else she tries to escape the loneliness god knows how, normaly it isnt in a wealthy way...my bigguest advice keet it real, make sure she is living the life she worked for, help her with this, job, school, family, friends etc prepare yourself we schizos are not very good with money, we spend it all...i hope she is feeling better

sure you know a lot of things, you are not stupid, we schizos just have to try to lead a normal life and dont think much about the past...take some time for yourself to get some answers and find out what you want to do with your life and follow it...say no to everything that is not a dream of yours, if you think you are not wellcomed in one spot, try to relax and move on slowly, calm is our bigguest asset

I am.. I am not sure in how many words but I can... Self care are routines or simple acts of taking care of ourselves, can be not buying the stuff we want just because we decided that we didn't needed it and the money went to something that helped us, for many schizophrenics can be just taking a shower or brushing the teeth, can be we making our favorite dish... I mean the word is self conscious it is self (from I) and care (from caring) it is not selfish. What you are reporting is not self care because that where the normal circumstances of your life, you have to think of self care when you saved money for the future, you have to think of self care when you ate those broccoli for lunch because you thought you had a bad diet... You see where I am getting to? That's is self care and self care is important.
